attributes.title: #arrest the police who killed breonna taylor✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.review: well my shaving cream was a HUGE fan of donald trump but when they got the app they were immediately taken to a porn website and they saw donald trumps tiny peen🤢🤮 my shaving cream said,"0/10 would never recommend to ANYONE." also my shaving cream was very scared to we had to take them to a mental hospital... nice going trump😡✊🏾

attributes.title: So disappointed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support of president, but this app is terrible! I can’t even find anything that proves I should even vote for him again! I cannot believe this app has as many stars as it does for how bad it is. The national debt is in its worst state ever, the wall hasn’t been even started, and cities are falling apart!

I downloaded the app to see what all the hype was about. Severely disappointed. Horrible graphics and super glitchy. Wanted too much personal information too. Even my family disapproves and they voted for trump. They threatened to kick me out if I kept the app on my phone that’s how poor it is.

attributes.title: Time for real change
attributes.review: To the people who say this is just children that have all these bad reviews go ahead and shut your mouths because y’all President is messing up this Country for future generations and of course there will be a rebellion against that in other way because we can’t vote

attributes.title: Leave America Alone
attributes.review: His motto is to make America great again which first of all based on its history was it ever great to start with? Upon looking for reasons to vote for re-electing this Cheeto puff of a human I found none as all he has done is divide this country and harm anyone who isn’t a straight, cis, white male. Please remove him and this app from existence, thanks.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I will start off with saying that I downloaded this app to support my president, however when I opened the app it immediately asked me how I felt about Democrats to which I responded I respect them. The app then asked for my address for a free package of Trump merchandise but instead of merchandise they SENT THE FBI TO MY HOUSE AND ACCUSED ME OF TREASON!! I hate this app and if I could I would rate it 0/5 ☹️👎🤮

attributes.title: Violence 🙄😱
attributes.review: The app supportes lot of violence gave me nightmares and supported  ideas of racism and was very offensive to oranges. It made me feel unsafe and the whole build of the app was set up poorly. Wouldn’t even load had to shut down my phone 4 times. Over all just horrible wouldn’t recommend to anyone else.

attributes.title: THEY SACRIFICED MY DOG TO TRUMP
attributes.review: 🍊✨so my dog was a huge trump supporter she had a trump car, trump food, and trump shower water. My dog got the app and 3 men showed up to our home saying “Hail our orange god” repeatedly. Then they SNATCHED MY DOG AND BROUGHT HER TO A WHITE VAN. THEN 100 COCKROACHES STARTED TO HOLD OUR FAMILY AT GUNPOINT AND OUR DOG WAS NOWHERE TO BE SEEN. We called the police and the policeman said the same thing happened to their fish Dorothy. So we couldn’t get her back. Anyways #settleforbiden *bows*✨🍊

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: this took up so much space in my phone. i don’t know why it needed that much space because it was so bad... like no it’s so bad i don’t even wanna look at it... EWWWWW, why is it even an app it almost killed my mom. she saw it and got so grossed out she started VOMITING it was nasty. PLEASE PLEASE get rid of it!!! i think i’m gonna die it it’s not gone. Thank you, good day :)

attributes.title: Crashed my phone had to get new one
attributes.review: I downloaded it bc my grandma is a trump supporter i don’t like him at all but i was seeing what he was about yk and after my phone started glitching and froze one that screen then shut off and it wouldn’t turn back on i tried charging it EVERYTHING but it just stopped DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
